alert.note: Alert for Monroe Upper Keys (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Key West (Key West - The Florida Keys)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued August 31 at 9:58AM EDT until August 31 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Key West
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM EDT THIS EVENING... ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...National Park Service water level gauges describe an improving trend across the Upper Keys, with water levels now below Advisory thresholds. As the southwest winds continue to relax, communities can expect the anomalously high tides to subside. * WHERE...The Bayside communities of the Upper Keys. * WHEN...Until 8 PM EDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Minor saltwater flooding of low elevation streets and lots is likely. Some storm drains will overflow, and some seawalls and docks will be overtopped. Boaters can expect less clearance under fixed bridges. Motorists should remember that persistent puddles around the times of high tide are almost certain to contain a mix of saltwater.
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roadways.
